response.overview: When contestants on a survival reality show vanish without a trace in the haunted expanse of Barlang Valley, one paranormal investigator's search for the truth unravels a web of urban legends, supernatural forces, and a dark history that refuses to stay buried.  You are Brian Everette, paranormal investigator, drawn into Barlang Valley to uncover what happened to the vanished contestants of the hit reality show afar. But this time, the nightmare plays by your rules, every choice you make twists the story deeper into terror. Will you survive the valley's cursed secrets.. or disappear forever like the rest?  You will make decisions, unlock unique scenes and endings, all with your DVD remote! can you survive the horror and unravel the entire mystery? Multiple choices, multiple endings and multiple deaths await... now prepare to choose or prepare to die!
response.title: AFAR: An Interactive Horror Film
